name: Input
description: A customizable input field component with glow effect on focus.
author: @rajdeep

props.name: type
props.description: The type of the input field

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text shown when input is empty

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback function triggered when input value changes

props.name: className
props.description: Custom Tailwind or CSS classes to style the input

customization.styling_notes: Input uses Tailwind classes for border, padding, and glow effect. Customize glow using focus:ring utilities.
